        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> openQuestionWithout(java.lang.String username,
                                                                                             java.lang.String password,
                                                                                             int number)
                                                                                      throws java.sql.SQLException
        This function will operate OpenQuestions without topics
        Parameters:
        username - A String representing the username of the user
        password - A String representing the password of the user
        number - An int representing the number of OpenQuestions needed to be retrieve
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of ArrayList containing the OpenQuestions with their answers
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Handle the SQL Excpetion thrown by the closure of the Result Set

      • openQuestionWith

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>>> openQuestionWith(java.util.List<java.lang.String> topics,
                                                                                                               java.lang.String username,
                                                                                                               java.lang.String password)
                                                                                                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        This function will operate OpenQuestions with topics
        Parameters:
        topics - A List representing the topics entered by the user
        username - A String representing the username of the user
        password - A String representing the password of the user
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of ArrayList of ArrayList of String containing the OpenQuestions with their answers
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Handle the SQL Excpetion thrown by the closure of the Result Set

      • performWith

        public static double performWith(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>>> openList)
        This function will perform a quiz with the ArrayList of ArrayList of ArrayList of String passed in as parameter and return the grade
        Parameters:
        openList - An ArrayList of ArrayList of ArrayList of String containing the OpenQuestions with their answers
        Returns:
        A double containing the final grade of the user

      • openQuestion

        public static double openQuestion(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> tempList,
                                  double total,
                                  int i)
        This function will perform a quiz with the ArrayList of String passed in as parameter and return the grade
        Parameters:
        tempList - An ArrayList of ArrayList of ArrayList of String containing the OpenQuestions with their answers
        i - An int containing the number of OpenQuestions need to be performed
        total - A double containing the grade of the user after perfoming OpenQuestions
        Returns:
        A double containing the final grade of the user
